description:
⚡ Role: Senior Sales Manager - Green Hydrogen Market

   Industry: Green Hydrogen Production

   Location: Remote with ability to travel across US

   Competitive Salary: ($100,000-130,000 + variable bonus + equity options)

We currently partnered with an enterprise industrial gas company who are building out a hydrogen division. They have been supplying industrial and commercial gas markets for the last 70 years.

This is an opportunity for a highly motivated and experienced Senior Sales Manager with a background in the hydrogen market or industrial gases industry to be a founding member of their team! This position will report directly to the COO.

Responsibilities:

· Identify and cultivate relationships with key stakeholders in the hydrogen market, including power companies, mobility sectors, fuel cell manufacturers, and powdered metals industries.

· Develop and implement strategic sales plans to achieve company goals and objectives.

· Act as the primary point of contact for senior level executives, demonstrating exceptional communication and negotiation skills.

Qualifications and Experience

· Proven experience in sales and business development within the hydrogen market or industrial gases sector

· Demonstrated ability to build and maintain relationships with clients and key stakeholders.

· Entrepreneurial mindset with a drive to succeed in a dynamic and fast-paced environment.

· Willingness to travel as required.

Why Apply?

· Competitive salary + generous benefits.

· Mission-driven company.

· Be part of a team solving this generation’s biggest questions.

   Sounds like you? Please click on the ‘Easy Apply’ button. You can also send your resume directly to jasmine.basi@storm4.com or message me directly!

⚡ Storm4 is a specialist GreenTech recruitment firm with clients across Europe, APAC, and North America. To discuss open opportunities or career options, please visit our website at www.storm4.com and follow the Storm4 LinkedIn page for the latest jobs and intel.
• If you have any extra requirements to support your application, then please just add a note along with your resume to let us know and send it to jasmine.basi@storm4.com
